description: This file contains test cases for the 'Agent' class and its interactions with the 'Claude' model, including synchronous and asynchronous thinking, stream processing, redacted thinking, and tool call verification within the 'agno' project.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of generating responses using specified models and tools.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A specific model implementation used within the agent, likely based on Anthropic's Claude model.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response object returned by the agent, including content, messages, and thinking metadata.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: A tool for fetching financial data, used within the agent for specific queries.

methods.name: test_thinking
methods.description: Tests the synchronous thinking response of the agent.

methods.name: test_thinking_stream
methods.description: Tests the streaming response of the agent.

methods.name: test_async_thinking
methods.description: Tests the asynchronous thinking response of the agent.

methods.name: test_async_thinking_stream
methods.description: Tests the asynchronous streaming response of the agent.

methods.name: test_redacted_thinking
methods.description: Tests the agent's response to a redacted thinking trigger string.

methods.name: test_thinking_with_tool_calls
methods.description: Verifies that the agent correctly makes tool calls during a query.

methods.name: test_redacted_thinking_with_tool_calls
methods.description: Verifies tool call behavior with redacted thinking in the message history.
